excerpt.rendered:
C9AP is a smart floodlight camera which can emit bright light and capture clear footage to protect your home
and the yard. This floodlight camera has embedded dual LED lights (maximum 3000 Lumens of brightness) and
a 3 megapixels digital camera with passive infrared sensors (PIR) mode to detect movements up to 12 meters
away. This floodlight camera not only offers night vision function, but also supports a diagonal 110 ° field of view
to capture the largest monitored area. C9AP can connect to Wi-Fi and supports both cloud storage and up to
256GB SD card local storage for live video recording. It is also compatible with ZSmart mobile APP that enables
human detection alert, real-time status notification and video review. The two-way call audio allows users to talk
interactively with the mobile APP through the camera.
